name: Badminton Time
description:
A competitive match between friends? Or perhaps a hilarious session with superpowers? Then you've come to the right place in Badminton Time!

Badminton Time will get you moving! Grab a Joy-Conâ„¢ in each hand and move your racket to strike.

1. Start the adventure by customizing your avatar: sporty and funky outfits, glasses, hats, rackets, ...

2. Discover all the game modes: 
- In realistic mode, the game offers first-rate physical simulation, just like in the real world.
- In arcade mode, you can use superpowers to drive your opponents crazy!
- In mini-game mode, you'll discover 5 different mini-games to show who's the best!
- In training mode, you can take part in various exercises to improve your level.

3. Travel the world to discover incredible places: Grand canyon, Japanese garden, North Pole, snowy forest, paradise island, ...

4. Don't forget that you can play alone, against AI and with humans. Up to 4 in the same match or mini-game! So get ready for matchmaking or invite your friends to join you!
intro: Get ready to move your arms to hit the badminton shuttlecock and become the new champion!
